valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 17 Oct 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Sat 18 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: High Malin 1027 expected German Bight 1029 by 0600 tomorrow. Atlantic low 988 expected 300 miles west of Sole by same time

In south, variable 2 to 4, becoming southerly or southeasterly 3 to 5, occasionally 6 later in northwest. In north, southerly or southeasterly 4 to 6.

In south, moderate or good, occasionally very poor in southeast. In north, moderate or good, occasionally poor.
